headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. If upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_FILE , use multipart/form-data . If upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_URL , use application/json .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: anchor_type
parameters.description: The type of anchor. Enum values: WEB_ANCHOR : Webpage anchor. A type of anchor through which you can display your website link above the creator's video description.

parameters.name: anchor_sub_type Conditional
parameters.description: Required when anchor_type is WEB_ANCHOR . The specific type of webpage anchor. Enum values: DESTINATION : Web destination link. This type directs viewers to a web destination link that can be opened in TikTok. The anchor shows up both in the creator's video and the comment section. Note : The web destination link is available for countries where TikTok Shop is not yet available. TikTok Shop is currently available in Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, Philippines, Malaysia, Singapore, United States, United Kingdom, and Saudi Arabia.

parameters.name: category_label_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when anchor_sub_type is DESTINATION . The ID of the category of your product or service. To learn about the supported values, see Supported values for category_label_id .

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The code of the country or region. The app information from this country or region's app store will be used. This anchor wonâ€™t be available in other countries or regions. When anchor_sub_type is DESTINATION , the supported values vary based on category_label_id . To learn about the supported values for a specific category ID, see Supported values for category_label_id . To learn about the country or region that the code represents, see Location code . Example: AU .

parameters.name: landing_page_url Conditional
parameters.description: Required when anchor_sub_type is DESTINATION . The URL of the page that the anchor will redirect viewers to. This page shows more information about your product or service. Ensure that the link provided is a product or service detail page. Otherwise, the anchor may be rejected during review.

parameters.name: anchor_title
parameters.description: The title of the anchor. When anchor_sub_type is DESTINATION , the enum values are: WATCH_NOW : Watch Now. LISTEN_NOW : Listen Now. READ_MORE : Read More. SHOW_NOW : Shop Now. GET_OFFER : Get Offer. LEARN_MORE : Learn More. CONTACT_US : Contact Us. JOIN_NOW : Join Now. APPLY_NOW : Apply Now.

parameters.name: anchor_name
parameters.description: The name of the anchor. Length limit: 32 characters. This information will not be shown to users in TikTok App.

parameters.name: upload_type
parameters.description: The upload method for thumbnail. Enum values: UPLOAD_BY_FILE : Upload by file. You need to specify thumbnail_url simultaneously. UPLOAD_BY_URL : Upload by URL. You need to specify thumbnail_file simultaneously.

parameters.name: thumbnail_file Conditional
parameters.description: Required when upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_FILE . The thumbnail file for the anchor. Specification requirements: File size: within 2 MB. Format: JPEG, PNG, and GIF. Resolution: 210 (width) x 375 (height) pixels. This information will not be shown to users in TikTok App.

parameters.name: thumbnail_url Conditional
parameters.description: Required when upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_URL . A publicly accessible thumbnail URL for the anchor. Specification requirements: File size: within 2 MB. Format: JPEG, PNG, and GIF. Resolution: 210 (width) x 375 (height) pixels. This information will not be shown to users in TikTok App.
